meanings.sent1: After the initial oxidation, the reoxidation of the metal surface occurred.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the reoxidation of the compound to understand its properties better.
meanings.sent3: The reoxidation of the apple slice made it look like it was blushing.
meanings.sent4: The reoxidation of the old memories brought a new perspective to her mind.
meanings.sent5: The reoxidation of the rusted iron was a slow but inevitable process.

meanings.definition: The process of adding oxygen back to a substance.
meanings.sent1: The reoxidation of the fire helped it burn brighter.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, they observed the reoxidation of the liquid as it bubbled.
meanings.sent3: The reoxidation of the balloon made it float higher in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a reoxidation of hope in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The reoxidation of the plant's roots allowed it to thrive in the new soil.
